title: FS: 1888 Yum Yum Tobacco Cap Anson SGC A
author: sportscardpete

posts.post_title: FS: 1888 Yum Yum Tobacco Cap Anson SGC A
posts.post_content:
Beat up - just bought it but doesn't fit what i want to  collect. Looking for $2,800 obo. pm or email me at [url]pianni89@gmail.com[/url] if interested, thanks!

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=580852&d=1689943012[/IMG]

I believe the way misidentified player cards are supposed to be "identified" is by the actual player pictured and not the incorrect name that was identified on the card. 

I guess this would be "Williamson" rather than Anson.  It's still a Yum Yum!
Exactly right, Fred. Technically, this is not an Anson card regardless of what the cert says.
bump and price cut on this nice but confusing yum yum!
